Work

Rhythm In Region

Built With: Javascript, HTML, Bootstrap

A user may search for upcoming concerts by city and genre. They will be provided with three sample songs from available bands in addition to a link that will forward them to a site to purchase tickets.

README Generator

Built With: Javascript, HTML, Node

A user is prompted with questions regarding their project. Once they answer the questions, a readme file is generated for them to add to their github repository.
